caption.p: Effects of T. capitatus on the depolarization and repolarization phases of the CAP. T. capitatus EO (TC, 100 μg/mL) was incubated in the rat sciatic nerve for 30 min followed by drug washout out with the physiological solution. The CAP parameters like (A) the depolarization velocity ( DV PAC ), and (B) the time constant of repolarization ( τ rep ), were quantified and compared to control. Values are expressed as mean ± S.E.M, n = 4. * p < 0.05 vs. control (Student’s t-test).
